phones: (documents) => { const phone = documents.find(item => item.documentTemplateId === 1).data.shipping.phone; return phone ? [phone] : []; }
emails: (documents) => { const email = documents.find(item => item.documentTemplateId === 1).data.shipping.email; return email ? [email] : []; }
phonesByUserId: (documents) => { const userId = documents.find(item => item.documentTemplateId === 1).data.shipping.userId; return userId ? [userId] : []; }
emailsByUserId: (documents) => { const userId = documents.find(item => item.documentTemplateId === 1).data.shipping.userId; return userId ? [userId] : []; }
fullText: (documents) => { const userName = documents.find(item => item.documentTemplateId === 1).data.shipping.userName; return 'Шановний ' + (userName || 'користувач') + ', Ваше замовлення відхилено.'; }
subject: (documents) => { return 'Ваше замовлення відхилено.'; }
